info.name: Grades Tracker
info.summary: A nextcloud app to track school grades.
info.description: Grades Tracker is a Nextcloud app that allows students, parents, and teachers to securely track and manage school grades within their private Nextcloud instance. Users can organize grades by subject and term, visualize academic progress, and set performance targets. The app supports features like weighted grading, user roles, and export/import functionality for easy data management.
info.author: Luca Albrecht
